member.name: T:battleship.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:battleship.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:battleship.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:battleship.My.Resources.Resources.HMAS_Warramunga__FFH_152__underway_in_the_Savu_Sea_on_11_December_2021__211211_N_NO250_1004_
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: F:battleship.frmGame.playerBoardArray
member.summary: playerBoardArray is a control array of pictureboxes. They handle the player view of the board (ships, hits and misses made by opponent)

member.name: F:battleship.frmGame.playerBoard
member.summary: playerBoard will store important information such as hits, misses and ships for the player

member.name: F:battleship.frmGame.opponentBoardArray
member.summary: opponentBoardArray is a control array of pictureboxes. This handles the player view of the opponents board (hits and misses)

member.name: F:battleship.frmGame.opponentBoard
member.summary: opponentBoard will store important information such as hits, misses and ships for the computer or second player

member.name: F:battleship.frmGame.playerShips
member.summary: PlayerShips stores the total number of ship sections that have not been hit. When this reaches 0, the game is over.

member.name: F:battleship.frmGame.opponentShips
member.summary: OpponentShips stores the total number of ship sections that have not been hit. When this reaches 0, the game is over.

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.frmGame_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This subroutine is run once when the form is first loaded. This is best for setting up control structures before the game starts.

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.initialiseControlArray
member.summary: Create two two-dimentional control arrays, one per board

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.setShips
member.summary: Before the game starts, set the ship locations on the board.

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.placeShips(System.Int32[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Place the ships on the board in a random manner
member.param: The board for the ships to be placed on

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.CanPlaceShip(System.Int32[0:,0:]@,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verify the ships do not overlap or fall off the board
member.param: Length of the ship to be placed
Orientation of the ship to be placed
member.returns: True/False. True if can be placed, false if not

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.reset
member.summary: Reset the board for a new game

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.clearPictureBoxes
member.summary: Clear each of the picture boxes by using two for loops. This is run to reset the board once the player returns to the starting form in preparation for a potential second game

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.isGameOver
member.summary: Function to verify if the game is won/lost
member.returns: True/False depending on whether the game is won

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.picOpp_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: On click of Opponent grid, launch an attack and change the colour appropriately

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.getXCoords(System.String)
member.summary: getCoords takes in a sender picturebox name (such as picOppA3) and return the appropriate number value for the letter

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.getYCoords(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the y value from a sender string

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.getComputerLevel
member.summary: Get the set computerlevel and return the correct subroutine.

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.easyComputerMove
member.summary: In the easiest computer mode, the computer guesses random squares.

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.mediumComputerMove
member.summary: Computer makes a guess, if its a hit it tries around to find the entire ship

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.unfairComputerMove
member.summary: Computer makes a move knowing exactly where the playerships are

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.GetPlayerBoardArray
member.summary: Return the playerBoardArray

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.doComputerMove(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox[0:,0:])
member.summary: Do the computer move on the displayed board

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.getRandomNum(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a random number based on an upper bound

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.delay(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delay action taken so computer move is not instant, and for flashing the guessed coordinate
member.param: How long the delay is in ms as type integer

member.name: M:battleship.frmGame.checkForSunkShips
member.summary: Check for sunk ships based on record of ship lengths. Update whether it is sunk accordingly

member.name: M:battleship.frmStart.btnStart_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When btnStart is clicked, start game

member.name: M:battleship.frmStart.verifyName(System.String)
member.summary: Verify the length of the name is acceptable
